targets.query: SELECT "runno" FROM "dunedaq.rcif.runinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "runno" > 0) AND $timeFilter

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_total_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tc_received_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_inhibited_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_paused_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_queue_timeout_expired_err_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT mean("rate_payloads_consumed") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE (partition_id = '${partition}' AND source_id=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tahandler-\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tahandler-\d+/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.tahandler-\d+/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tahandler-\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tahandler-\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_bad")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tahandler-\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_old_window")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tahandler-\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_timed_out")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tahandler-\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_uncategorized")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tahandler-\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tahandler-\d+/ AND $timeFilter AND "num_requests_handled">0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tahandler-\d+/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT min("min_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tahandler-\d+/ AND $timeFilter AND "num_requests_handled">0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("max_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tahandler-\d+/ AND $timeFilter AND "num_requests_handled">0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tahandler-\d+/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tahandler-\d+/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("num_requests_waiting") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.tahandler-\d+/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter
list.label: Partition name
list.name: partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter
